question: The ASI recently discovered Sanskrit inscriptions about Saptamatrikas in Andhra Pradesh. These were issued by which king?
explanation: The recently discovered inscription by ASI in Andhra Pradesh was issued by the Satavahana dynastyâ€™s King Vijaya. It was written in Brahmi script about the cult of Saptamatrikas. It is the oldest example of its kind in South India.
